title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Science Instructional Design Workshop for Global Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge and general understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive instructional design strategies reflecting cultural contexts by analyzing global science education cases.
Learners can design science education modules for international collaborative projects using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can improve globally competent educational materials by exchanging peer feedback based on assessment rubrics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
